sentences.english: This would be the last time I cut any classes for a basketball game.
sentences.chinese: 这会是我最后一次为篮球比赛而逃课。

sentences.english: He is like you. I remember when we were at the college, you always skipped classes.
sentences.chinese: 他和你一样，我记得我们上大学的时候你就总是逃课。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, the reasons for truancy include the following three aspects.
sentences.chinese: 大致说来，逃课的理由包括以下三个方面。

sentences.english: California school district is using GPS devices to keep tabs on students with a history of cutting class.
sentences.chinese: 加州某学区目前使用GPS监控那些有逃课史的学生。

sentences.english: There was no denying that she was fun-loving and often cut classes .
sentences.chinese: 如果说她好玩，经常逃课，那是不能否认的。

sentences.english: Everyone skips now and then, but don’t make it a habit.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都会偶尔逃课，但是不要让它成为一个习惯。

sentences.english: He told me that this would be the last time he cut any classes for a basketball game.
sentences.chinese: 他告诉我，这会是他最后一次因为篮球比赛逃课。

sentences.english: Others play truant because the teaching is truly dissatisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 而另一些学生逃课则是因为教学实在是过于差强人意。

sentences.english: Wondering if you should skip class today?
sentences.chinese: 算一算，你是否应该逃课？

sentences.english: That night, skip class shopping, you buy clothes.
sentences.chinese: 那一晚，逃课逛街，给你买了衣服。

sentences.english: You can deal with the two students skipping classes as you see fit.
sentences.chinese: 这两个逃课的学生，你们酌情处理吧。

sentences.english: Lily: Yes, I think so. Do you agree to cut class?
sentences.chinese: 是的，我也这么认为，你同意我逃课吗？

definition: to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
to skip work/to sneak out of work early
to study outside of class time (reviewing one's lessons)/to study in one's free time/individual study
to repeat a year in school
(coll.) to sit in on a class
to spend time in a bar (alcohol, Internet etc)/to go clubbing
